about.title: About Us
about.historyP1: Since 2014, we have helped online fashion retailers sell more. Sizebay was born to solve one of the industry's biggest challenges: finding the right size.
about.historyP2: We combine anthropometry, fashion, statistics, and technology to create Size & Fit – a tool that reduces returns and increases confidence at the time of purchase.
about.expertiseP: We operate at the intersection of fashion, technology, and performance. AI, e-commerce, textiles – we combine technical knowledge and strategic vision to deliver real results.
about.globalP1: We serve stores in 60+ countries, with solutions in 30+ languages. Our systems are secure, scalable, and compliant with major data regulations.
